languages.text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

languages.text: 每当装备者对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果时，额外施加2层效果。
languages.original_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}时，额外施加2层效果。
每当装备者对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}时，额外施加2层效果。

languages.text: Когда персонаж накладывает на цель эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, цель получает +2 уровня этого эффекта дополнительно.
languages.original_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, цель получает +2 уровня этого эффекта дополнительно.

Когда персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, цель получает +2 уровня этого эффекта дополнительно.

languages.text: ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}のいずれかの効果を与えた際、この効果のスタックが+2追加される。
languages.original_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}のいずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を与えた際、効果のスタック+2

languages.text: Si el portador inflige el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} a un objetivo, el objetivo recibe +2 acumulaciones adicionales del efecto.
languages.original_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador inflige el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} a un objetivo, el objetivo recibe +2 acumulaciones adicionales del efecto.

languages.text: Verursacht der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-Effekt, wird das Ziel mit +2 Stapeln des Effektes belegt.
languages.original_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Verursacht der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutungs-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennungs-{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} bei einem Ziel, erhält dieses Ziel zusätzlich +2 Stapel dieses Effekts.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} à une cible, celle-ci subit 2 cumuls supplémentaires de cet effet.
languages.original_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur inflige l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} à une cible, celle-ci bénéficie de +2 cumuls supplémentaires de cet effet.

languages.text: Takan kişi bir hedefte {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkisi oluşturursa hedef, o etkinin +2 ilave birikimine daha maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.
